name: Character Generator
description: A simple Firebase Genkit app to generate fantasy characters

scripts.start_with_key_check: if [ -z "${GOOGLE_GENAI_API_KEY}" ]; then echo 'No Gemini API key detected, enter a Gemini API key from https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey:' && read -s GOOGLE_GENAI_API_KEY && export GOOGLE_GENAI_API_KEY; fi && npm run start
